name: Push Figures
description:
Welcome to our online arena Push Figures, this is our first alpha test release before we upload our game to Steam! 

Start by customizing your character by choosing between multiple hats and faces, change your player name and pick your favorite color to give your character a little bit of you! 

Hop into a game and enjoy our first 3 arenas designed for the competition! Your main objective is to push other players off the platform, each player has three lives and will respawn after 10 seconds.

Each level has coins scattered around the map that will be used for purchasing new gear at the shop & in the future more awesome content!

After the final player is still alive, the game will end and a choice for each player will be given to either vote for a new level or leave back to the main menu! 

See you online!
